short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to allow you to screenshare on Rendevus.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download this extension to enable screen sharing on rendevus.com

To enable audio on your screenshare make sure to click audioshare when selecting the application to share

To stream fullsize video games, configure them to play in windowed mode
